creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
At edge: [43] (number of the piece in the series);
Atsutada\'s poem (followed by explanation):
(Compared with the feeling
After I actually saw you
My adoration for you
At the time before that
Seems nothing to me)
{Ai mite no
Nochi no kokoro ni
Kurabure ba
Mukashi wa mono wo 
Omowa zari keri}
markings: Publisher: Ebisu; URC: red collector seal: [AM]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Illustrations of the Hundred Poems by the Hundred Poets (Hyakunin isshu no uchi)
title: Illustration of the Gonchūnagon Atsutada's Poem
